Desc.entry: South Yorkshire League cricket club, with a very strong junior section for girls and boys aged 7 years and over. Coaching available throughout the summer and winter with special coaching weeks held throughout the summer holiday. Hallam Day (cricket and fun for all the family) last Sunday in June.

ProvisionPlaceDisabledAccess.entry: Wheelchair access, with prior notice as gates require unlocking.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Thurs 6.30-8.30pm (seniors), Fri 6-7.30pm (under 11's), older juniors on other nights (Apr-Sep), Winter nets and junior practices (Nov-Apr)
